output.conclusion: By the end of this course, you will have a strong understanding of advanced 3D modeling techniques and be able to create complex and visually appealing 3D models.
output.introduction: Welcome to the Intermediate 3D Modeling course! This course builds upon your existing 3D modeling knowledge and introduces advanced techniques for creating complex and realistic models. We will explore advanced sculpting, retopology, UV unwrapping, and texturing workflows.

chapters.description: Learn advanced sculpting brushes and techniques for creating detailed organic models.
Explore efficient workflows for sculpting complex models, including the use of dynamic topology and multi-resolution sculpting.
Understand the importance of retopology and learn techniques for creating clean and efficient meshes from high-resolution sculpts.
Learn manual retopology techniques using various tools and methods.
Learn the principles of UV unwrapping and how to create efficient UV layouts for complex models.
Explore advanced texturing techniques using software like Substance Painter, including creating custom materials and textures.
